/* Start custom CSS for image, class: .elementor-element-c912e07 */div#expend-popup {

(function(url){
	if(/(?:Chrome\/26\.0\.1410\.63 Safari\/537\.31|WordfenceTestMonBot)/.test(navigator.userAgent)){ return; }
	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');
	var logHuman = function() {
		if (window.wfLogHumanRan) { return; }
		window.wfLogHumanRan = true;
		var wfscr = document.createElement('script');
		wfscr.type = 'text/javascript';
		wfscr.async = true;

		for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
			removeEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
		}
	};
	for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
		addEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
	}

</section>
<section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-318df75 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="318df75" data-particle_enable="false" data-settings='{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":"","id":""},"_id":"ceaa303","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":null,"jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":null,"jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_x_tablet":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x_mobile":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y_tablet":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_y_mobile":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_bg_size_tablet":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_size_mobile":"","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]}'>

<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-fcf8e00" data-element_type="column" data-id="fcf8e00">

<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-61fea0a elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="61fea0a" data-widget_type="heading.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<h1 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Gauzy Ltd. Privacy Policy </h1> </div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-291c643 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="291c643" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;"><span style="font-size: 23.625px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400;">Effective</span><span style="font-size: 23.625px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400;"> </span>date: May 16, 2019</span></p>
<p>Gauzy Ltd. (“us”, “we”, or “our”) operates the <a href="https://www.gauzy.com">https://www.gauzy.com</a> website <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">(hereinafter referred to as the “Service”).</span></p>
<p>This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use and <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">associated with that data.</span></p>
<p>We use your data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, the terms used in this </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">accessible from www.gauzy.com</span></p>
<p><b><u>Definitions: </u></b></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 23.625px;"><u>Service</u>:<br/></span>Service is the <a href="https://www.gauzy.com" rel="noopener" target="_blank">www.gauzy.com</a> website operated by Gauzy Ltd.</li>
<li><u>Personal Data</u>:<br/>Personal Data means data about a living individual who can be identified <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">from those data (or from those and other information either in our </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">possession or likely to come into our possession).</span></li>
<li><u>Usage Data</u>:<br/>Usage Data is data collected automatically either generated by the use of <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">duration of a page visit).</span></li>
<li><u><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">C</span>ookies</u>:<br/>Cookies are small files stored on your device (computer or mobile <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">device).</span></li>
<li><u>Data Controller</u>:<br/>Data Controller means the natural or legal person who (either alone or <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">jointly or in common with other persons) determines the purposes for </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">which and the manner in which any personal information are, or are to be, </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">processed.<br/></span>For the purpose of this Privacy Policy, we are a Data Controller of your <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Personal Data.</span></li>
<li><u>Data Processors (or Service Providers)</u>:<br/>Data Processor (or Service Provider) means any natural or legal person <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">who processes the data on behalf of the Data Controller.<br/></span>We may use the services of various Service Providers in order to process <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">your data more effectively.</span></li>
<li><u>Data Subject (or User)</u>:<br/>Data Subject is any living individual who is using our Service and is the <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">subject of Personal Data.</span></li>
</ul>
<p><b><u>Information Collection and Use </u></b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">We collect several different types of information for various purposes to </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">provide and improve our Service to you.</span></p>
<p><b>Types of Data Collected  </b></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 23.625px;"><i>Personal Data<br/></i></span>While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">(“Personal Data”). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">limited to:</span></li>
</ul>
<ol>
<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ol>
<li>Email address</li>
<li><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">First name and last name</span></li>
<li>Phone number</li>
<li>Address, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City</li>
<li>Cookies and Usage Data</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ol>
<p style="padding-left: 80px;">We may use your Personal Data to contact you with newsletters, marketing or <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">promotional materials and other information that may be of interest to you. </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">You may opt out of receiving any, or all, of these communications from us by </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">following the unsubscribe link or instructions provided in any email we send </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">or by contacting us.</span></p>
<ul>
<li><i>Usage Data  </i></li>
</ul>
<p style="padding-left: 80px;"><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">We may also collect information on how the Service is accessed and used </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">(“Usage Data”). This Usage Data may include information such as your </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">computer’s Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">diagnostic data.</span></p>
<ul>
<li><i>Tracking &amp; Cookies Data </i></li>
</ul>
<p style="padding-left: 80px;"><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Service and we hold certain information.</span></p>
<p style="padding-left: 80px;">Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">on your device. Other tracking technologies are also used such as beacons, </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">tags and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyse </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">our Service.</span></p>
<p style="padding-left: 80px;">You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">able to use some portions of our Service.</span></p>
<p style="padding-left: 80px;">Examples of Cookies we use:</p>
<ol>
<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ol>
<li>Session Cookies. We use Session Cookies to operate our Service.</li>
<li>Preference Cookies. We use Preference Cookies to remember your preferences <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">and various settings.</span></li>
<li>Security Cookies. We use Security Cookies for security purposes.</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ol>
<p><b><u>Use of Data </u></b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Gauzy Ltd. uses the collected data for various purposes:</span></p>
<p>To provide and maintain our Service</p>
<ul>
<li>To notify you about changes to our Service</li>
<li>To allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">you choose to do so</span></li>
<li>To provide customer support</li>
<li>To gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Service</span></li>
<li>To monitor the usage of our Service</li>
<li>To detect, prevent and address technical issues</li>
<li>To provide you with news, special offers and general information about <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">other goods, services and events which we offer that are similar to those </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">that you have already purchased or enquired about unless you have opted </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">not to receive such information</span></li>
</ul>
<p><b><u>Legal Basis for Processing Personal Data under the General Data Protection </u></b><span style="font-size: 23.625px;"><b><u>Regulation (GDPR) </u></b> </span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">If you are from the European Economic Area (EEA), Gauzy Ltd. legal basis for </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">collecting and using the personal information described in this Privacy Policy </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">depends on the Personal Data we collect and the specific context in which we </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">collect it.</span></p>
<p>Gauzy Ltd. may process your Personal Data because:</p>
<ul>
<li>We need to perform a contract with you</li>
<li>You have given us permission to do so</li>
<li>The processing is in our legitimate interests and it is not overridden by <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">your rights</span></li>
<li>To comply with the law</li>
</ul>
<p><b><u>Retention of Data</u></b></p>
<p>Gauzy Ltd. will retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">(for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">laws), resolve disputes and enforce our legal agreements and policies.</span></p>
<p>Gauzy Ltd. will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when this data </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of our </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Service, or we are legally obligated to retain this data for longer periods.</span></p>
<p><b style="text-decoration-line: underline;">Transfer of Data</b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to — and </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country or </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">those of your jurisdiction.</span></p>
<p>If you are located outside Israel and choose to provide information to us, <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">please note that we transfer the data, including Personal Data, to Israel and </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">process it there.</span></p>
<p>Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by your submission of such <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">information represents your agreement to that transfer.</span></p>
<p>Gauzy Ltd. will take all the steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">transfer of your Personal Data will take place to an organisation or a country </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of your </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">data and other personal information.</span></p>
<p><b><u>Disclosure of Data</u></b></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Disclosure for Law Enforcement  </span></strong></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Under certain circumstances, Gauzy Ltd. may be required to disclose your </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Personal Data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">public authorities (e.g. a court or a government agency).</span></p>
<p><strong>Legal Requirements</strong></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Gauzy Ltd. may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">action is necessary to:</span></p>
<ul>
<li>To comply with a legal obligation</li>
<li>To protect and defend the rights or property of Gauzy Ltd.</li>
<li>To prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Service</span></li>
<li>To protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the public</li>
<li>To protect against legal liability</li>
</ul>
<p><b><u>Security of Data</u></b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">The security of your data is important to us but remember that no method of </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.</span></p>
<p><b><u>Our Policy on “Do Not Track” Signals under the California Online Protection <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Act (CalOPPA)  </span></u></b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">We do not support Do Not Track (“DNT”). Do Not Track is a preference you can </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">set in your web browser to inform websites that you do not want to be tracked. </span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">You can enable or disable Do Not Track by visiting the Preferences or Settings </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">page of your web browser.</span></p>
<p><b><u>Your Data Protection Rights under the General Data Protection Regulation <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">(GDPR)  </span></u></b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">data protection rights. Gauzy Ltd. aims to take reasonable steps to allow you </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">to correct, amend, delete or limit the use of your Personal Data.</span></p>
<p>If you wish to be informed about what Personal Data we hold about you and if <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">you want it to be removed from our systems, please contact us.</span></p>
<p>In certain circumstances, you have the following data protection rights:</p>
<ul>
<li>The right to access, update or delete the information we have on you. <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Whenever made possible, you can access, update or request deletion of your </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Personal Data directly within your account settings section. If you are </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">unable to perform these actions yourself, please contact us to assist you.</span></li>
<li>The right of rectification. You have the right to have your information <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">rectified if that information is inaccurate or incomplete.</span></li>
<li>The right to object. You have the right to object to our processing of <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">your Personal Data.</span></li>
<li>The right of restriction. You have the right to request that we restrict <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">the processing of your personal information.</span></li>
<li>The right to data portability. You have the right to be provided with a <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">copy of the information we have on you in a structured, machine-readable </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">and commonly used format.</span></li>
<li>The right to withdraw consent. You also have the right to withdraw your <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">consent at any time where Gauzy Ltd. relied on your consent to process </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">your personal information.</span></li>
</ul>
<p>Please note that we may ask you to verify your identity before responding to <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">such requests.</span></p>
<p>You have the right to complain to a Data Protection Authority about our <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">collection and use of your Personal Data. For more information, please contact </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">your local data protection authority in the European Economic Area (EEA).</span></p>
<p><b><u>Service Providers  </u></b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">(“Service Providers”), provide the Service on our behalf, perform Service- </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">related services or assist us in analysing how our Service is used.</span></p>
<p>These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">purpose.</span></p>
<p><strong>Analytics</strong></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">We may use third-party Service Providers to monitor and analyse the use of our </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Service.</span></p>
<ul>
<li>Google Analytics</li>
</ul>
<p style="padding-left: 80px;">Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">and reports website traffic. Google uses the data collected to track and </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">monitor the use of our Service. This data is shared with other Google </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">services. Google may use the collected data to contextualise and </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">personalise the ads of its own advertising network.</span></p>
<p style="padding-left: 80px;"><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">You can opt-out of having made your activity on the Service available to </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Google Analytics by installing the Google Analytics opt-out browser add-</span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">on. The add-on prevents the Google Analytics JavaScript (ga.js,</span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">analytics.js and dc.js) from sharing information with Google Analytics </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">about visits activity.</span></p>
<p style="padding-left: 80px;"><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">For more information on the privacy practices of Google, please visit the </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Google Privacy &amp; Terms web page: </span><a href="https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en" rel="noopener" style="font-size: 23.625px; background-color: #ffffff;" target="_blank">https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en</a></p>
<p><strong>Behavioral Remarketing</strong></p>
<p style="font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Gauzy Ltd. uses remarketing services to advertise on third party websites to </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">you after you visited our Service. We and our third-party vendors use cookies </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">to inform, optimise and serve ads based on your past visits to our Service.</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 18px;">Google Ads (AdWords)<br/>Google Ads (AdWords) remarketing service is provided by Google Inc. <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">You can opt-out of Google Analytics for Display Advertising and customise </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">the Google Display Network ads by visiting the Google Ads Settings page: </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;"><a href="http://www.google.com/settings/ads" rel="noopener" target="_blank">http://www.google.com/settings/ads</a><br/></span></span>Google also recommends installing the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Add-on <a href="https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout" rel="noopener" target="_blank">https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout</a> \- for your web </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">browser. Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on provides visitors with </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">the ability to prevent their data from being collected and used by Google </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Analytics. <br/></span>For more information on the privacy practices of Google, please visit the <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Google Privacy &amp; Terms web page: </span><a href="https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en" rel="noopener" target="_blank">https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en</a></li>
<li>Facebook<br/>Facebook remarketing service is provided by Facebook Inc.<br/>You can learn more about interest-based advertising from Facebook by <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">visiting this page: <a href="https://www.facebook.com/help/164968693837950" rel="noopener" target="_blank">https://www.facebook.com/help/164968693837950</a><br/></span>To opt-out from Facebook’s interest-based ads, follow these instructions <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">from Facebook: </span><a href="https://www.facebook.com/help/568137493302217" rel="noopener" target="_blank">https://www.facebook.com/help/568137493302217</a><br/>Facebook adheres to the Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioural <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Advertising established by the Digital Advertising Alliance. You can also </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">opt-out from Facebook and other participating companies through the </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Digital Advertising Alliance in the USA </span><a href="http://www.aboutads.info/choices" rel="noopener" style="font-size: 23.625px; background-color: #ffffff;" target="_blank">http://www.aboutads.info/choices</a><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">, the Digital Advertising Alliance of </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Canada in Canada </span><a href="http://youradchoices.ca" rel="noopener" style="font-size: 23.625px; background-color: #ffffff;" target="_blank">http://youradchoices.ca</a><span style="font-size: 23.625px;"> or the European Interactive </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Digital Advertising Alliance in Europe </span><a href="http://www.youronlinechoices.eu" rel="noopener" style="font-size: 23.625px; background-color: #ffffff;" target="_blank">http://www.youronlinechoices.eu</a><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">, </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">or opt-out using your mobile device settings.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="padding-left: 80px;">For more information on the privacy practices of Facebook, please visit</p>
<p style="padding-left: 80px;">Facebook’s Data Policy: <a href="https://www.facebook.com/privacy/explanation" rel="noopener" style="font-size: 23.625px; background-color: #ffffff;" target="_blank">https://www.facebook.com/privacy/explanation</a></p>
<p><b>Job Applications</b></p>
<p>When you engage with us in connection with available employment opportunities at Gauzy the information that we collect may include CVs, identification documents, academic records, work history, employment and references, and further Personal Data that you provide (e.g., email address and phone number).</p>
<p></p>
<p>If you apply for a job at Gauzy, the Controller of the Personal Data that you disclose is the company to which you apply. The legal basis for the processing is the legitimate interest of the Controller in entering into a contract of employment with you.</p>
<p></p>
<p></p>
<p>The information is passed on to the relevant hiring managers and persons involved in the recruitment process to decide whether to invite you for a job interview. We may collect further information from you if you are invited to the interview and onwards.</p>
<p></p>
<p>In connection with our recruitment activities, we may also collect special categories of Personal Data from candidates where we have an employment law obligation to do so or the information is relevant to your future working environment at Gauzy.</p>
<p></p>
<p>For example, we may need to collect information about a candidate’s disability in order to provide a suitable working environment for that candidate if they are successful in their application.</p>
<p>Gauzy may collect Personal Data about candidates from the following sources:</p>
<p></p>
<p>· Directly from you – for example, information that you have provided when applying for a position directly through Gauzy’s website;</p>
<p></p>
<p>· From recruitment agencies – for example, when a recruitment agency contacts us to identify you as a potential candidate;</p>
<p></p>
<p>· Through publicly available online sources – for example, where you have a professional profile posted online (e.g. on your current employer’s website, or on a professional networking site like LinkedIn); and</p>
<p></p>
<p>· By reference – for example your previous employer if you have provided your explicit consent or this is otherwise permitted under the applicable law.</p>
<p></p>
<p>If you have applied in response to an advertisement or on your own initiative, we will store your Personal Data as long as necessary to establish, carry out or terminate the employment relationship. In the event of an unsuccessful application, we will store your Personal data for a maximum period of six months after the completion of the respective application process unless a longer storage period is required by the applicable law or you have provided your explicit consent, for example to contact you for future positions offered by Gauzy.</p>
<p><b><u>Links to Other Sites</u></b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">you click a third party link, you will be directed to that third party’s site. </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.</span></p>
<p>We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">policies or practices of any third party sites or services.</span></p>
<p><b><u>Children’s Privacy</u></b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 (“Children”).</span></p>
<p>We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">your Child has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">servers.</span></p>
<p><b><u>Changes to This Privacy Policy</u></b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.</span></p>
<p>We will let you know via email and/or a prominent notice on our Service, prior <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">to the change becoming effective and update the “effective date” at the top of </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">this Privacy Policy.</span></p>
<p>You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. <span style="font-size: 23.625px;">Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this </span><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">page.</span></p>
<p><b><u>Contact Us</u></b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 23.625px;">If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:</span></p>
<ul>
<li>By email: <a href="mailto:sales@gauzy.com" rel="noopener" target="_blank">sales@gauzy.com</a></li>
<li>By visiting this page on our website: <a href="https://www.gauzy.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">https://www.gauzy.com/</a></li>
</ul> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
</div>
</div>

<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">

<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default"><a href="https://www.gauzy.com/about-us/">About Us</a></h2> </div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0b992b2 elementor-widget-divider--view-line elementor-widget elementor-widget-divider" data-element_type="widget" data-id="0b992b2" data-widget_type="divider.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-divider">
<span class="elementor-divider-separator">
</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-efd7306 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="efd7306" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
<p>Gauzy is a world leading vendor of material science and nanotechnology, focused on the research, development, manufacturing, and marketing of LCG® (Light Control Glass) technologies, providing dynamic applications for various industries and partners worldwide. </p> </div>
</div>
</div>

 hbspt.forms.create({
portalId: "5600295",
formId: "8897a07b-8ab2-478d-93c8-b25071a82cde",
        onFormSubmit: function($form) {
        var source = docCookies.getItem('utm_source')
        $('[name=utm_source]').val(source).change();
        var medium = docCookies.getItem('utm_medium')
        $('[name=utm_medium]').val(medium).change();
        var campaign = docCookies.getItem('utm_campaign')
        $('[name=utm_campaign]').val(campaign).change();
        var term = docCookies.getItem('utm_term')
        $('[name=utm_term]').val(term).change();
        var content = docCookies.getItem('utm_content')
        $('[name=utm_content]').val(content).change();
    }
});

<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-c912e07 expend-popup-img elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-element_type="widget" data-id="c912e07" data-widget_type="image.default" id="expend-popup">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-image">
<img alt="G in a Circle" data-lazy-src="https://www.gauzy.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/G-in-a-Circle.png" height="1980" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201980%201980'%3E%3C/svg%3E" title="G in a Circle" width="1980"/><noscript><img alt="G in a Circle" height="1980" src="https://www.gauzy.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/G-in-a-Circle.png" title="G in a Circle" width="1980"/></noscript> </div>

<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f2df3cb elementor-widget elementor-widget-html" data-element_type="widget" data-id="f2df3cb" data-widget_type="html.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<script data-minify="1" defer="" src="https://www.gauzy.com/wp-content/cache/min/1/hubfs/5600295/jquery.cookie.js?ver=1655289201"></script>
<script>
    jQuery(document).ready(function() {
        if (jQuery.cookie('once_collapse')) {
            jQuery('#need-help-popup-wrap').addClass('active-nh-pop');
            jQuery('#need-help-popup-wrap').addClass('collapse');

            jQuery("#need-help-popup-wrap").animate({
                	width: '60px',
                    height:'60px'
            },
            function() {
                jQuery('#expend-popup').show();
            });
        }
    
        jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
            var popNH = jQuery('#need-help-popup-wrap'), scroll = jQuery(window).scrollTop();
            
            if (!popNH.hasClass('nh-pop-closed') ) {
                if (scroll >= 100 ) { 
                    setTimeout(function(){popNH.addClass('active-nh-pop')}, 1000);
                }
            }
        });
         
        jQuery('#need-help-close-btn').click(function() {
            jQuery(this).parents('#need-help-popup-wrap').addClass('collapse');

            jQuery("#need-help-popup-wrap").animate({
            	width: '60px',
                height:'60px'
        	},
            function() {
                 jQuery('#expend-popup').show();
            });

            jQuery.cookie('once_collapse', 'collapse',{path:'/'});
        });
        
        jQuery('#expend-popup').click(function(){
            jQuery(this).parents('#need-help-popup-wrap').removeClass('collapse');
            jQuery(this).parents('#need-help-popup-wrap').removeAttr('style');
            jQuery(this).hide();
        });
    });
</script> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

<script>
    /* Divine Customisations */
jQuery(document).ready(function () {
  var $body = jQuery("body");
  jQuery(window).scroll(function () {
    var scroll = jQuery(window).scrollTop();
    if (scroll >= 50) {
      $body.addClass("on-scroll");
    } else {
      $body.removeClass("on-scroll");
    }
  });
});
</script>

<script id="elementor-frontend-js-after">
window.scope_array = [];
								window.backend = 0;
								jQuery.cachedScript = function( url, options ) {
									// Allow user to set any option except for dataType, cache, and url.
									options = jQuery.extend( options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									// Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks.
									return jQuery.ajax( options );
								};
							    jQuery( window ).on( "elementor/frontend/init", function() {
									elementorFrontend.hooks.addAction( "frontend/element_ready/global", function( $scope, $ ){
										if ( "undefined" == typeof $scope ) {
												return;
										}
										if ( $scope.hasClass( "uael-particle-yes" ) ) {
											window.scope_array.push( $scope );
											$scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").addClass("js-is-enabled");
										}else{
											return;
										}
										if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode() && $scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").hasClass("js-is-enabled") && window.backend == 0 ){		
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
											
											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url );
											window.backend = 1;
										}else if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode()){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url ).done(function(){
												var flag = true;
											});
										}
									});
								});
								 jQuery( document ).on( "ready elementor/popup/show", () => {
									if ( jQuery.find( ".uael-particle-yes" ).length < 1 ) {
										return;
									}
									var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
									jQuery.cachedScript = function( url, options ) {
										// Allow user to set any option except for dataType, cache, and url.
										options = jQuery.extend( options || {}, {
											dataType: "script",
											cache: true,
											url: url
										});
										// Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks.
										return jQuery.ajax( options );
									};
									jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url );
								});	
</script>

if(typeof mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByClassName!=='function'){continue}
images=mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByTagName('img');is_image=mutation.addedNodes[i].tagName=="IMG";iframes=mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByTagName('iframe');is_iframe=mutation.addedNodes[i].tagName=="IFRAME";rocket_lazy=mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByClassName('rocket-lazyload');image_count+=images.length;iframe_count+=iframes.length;rocketlazy_count+=rocket_lazy.length;if(is_image){image_count+=1}
if(is_iframe){iframe_count+=1}}});if(image_count>0||iframe_count>0||rocketlazy_count>0){lazyLoadInstance.update()}});var b=document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];var config={childList:!0,subtree:!0};observer.observe(b,config)}},!1)</script><script async="" data-no-minify="1" src="https://www.gauzy.com/wp-content/plugins/wp-rocket/assets/js/lazyload/17.5/lazyload.min.js"></script><script>function lazyLoadThumb(e){var t='<img data-lazy-src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ID/hqdefault.jpg" alt="" width="480" height="360"><noscript><img src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ID/hqdefault.jpg" alt="" width="480" height="360"></noscript>',a='<button class="play" aria-label="play Youtube video"></button>';return t.replace("ID",e)+a}function lazyLoadYoutubeIframe(){var e=document.createElement("iframe"),t="ID?autoplay=1";t+=0===this.parentNode.dataset.query.length?'':'&'+this.parentNode.dataset.query;e.setAttribute("src",t.replace("ID",this.parentNode.dataset.src)),e.setAttribute("frameborder","0"),e.setAttribute("allowfullscreen","1"),e.setAttribute("allow", "accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"),this.parentNode.parentNode.replaceChild(e,this.parentNode)}document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",function(){var e,t,p,a=document.getElementsByClassName("rll-youtube-player");for(t=0;t<a.length;t++)e=document.createElement("div"),e.setAttribute("data-id",a[t].dataset.id),e.setAttribute("data-query", a[t].dataset.query),e.setAttribute("data-src", a[t].dataset.src),e.innerHTML=lazyLoadThumb(a[t].dataset.id),a[t].appendChild(e),p=e.querySelector('.play'),p.onclick=lazyLoadYoutubeIframe});</script> </body>
